name: Heartbeat (Last Angle Studio)
description:
Made in 48 hours for the GMKT game jam of 2021! 

~Theme: Joined together~

* If for some reason you can't move, try reloading the page!* 

Carry your heart to safety and defeat the phantoms that have come to eat it! Protect it at all costs, for your life-force is joined together with it!

Gameplay:

Protect your heart from the incoming horde of phantoms and destroy their portals. Stay close to you heart and shoot your enemies with your plasma blaster, or keep some distance from it to enter Wrath mode. In Wrath mode, your attacks deal devastating damage to everything around you.

Tip: Destroying a portal will kill all phantoms that spawned from it.

Controls:

-Use the mouse to aim and left click to shoot.

-In Wrath mode, left click to use your special attack

-WASD or arrow keys to move

-Hold spacebar to carry your heart

Music, sfx & level design by Iestyn Hoekstra

Programming & graphics by Heather Hoekstra
